meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>red light district</kanji> (花柳) <kanji>world</kanji> of the red light district is the <vocabulary>red light district</vocabulary>, though this can refer especially to the "<vocabulary>pleasure quarters</vocabulary>" or "<vocabulary>world of the geisha</vocabulary>" as well.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
